00039 InputFileDevice::InputFileDevice(
00040         const char* const STR_FileName,
00041         OutputDevice& CLI_Output,
00042         const bool B_AutoDelete)
00043   : IODevice(tk::String::Concat(MAX_DEVICE_NAME_LENGTH, "input-file[", STR_FileName, "]"), "\n", B_AutoDelete),
00044     m_strFileName(MAX_FILE_PATH_LENGTH, STR_FileName), m_pfFile(NULL),
00045     m_cliOutput(CLI_Output),
00046     m_iCurrentLine(0), m_iCurrentColumn(0), m_iNextLine(1), m_iNextColumn(1)
00047 {
00048     EnsureCommonDevices();
00049 
00050     m_cliOutput.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00051 }
00052 
00053 InputFileDevice::~InputFileDevice(void)
00054 {
00055     m_cliOutput.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00056 }
00057 
00058 const bool InputFileDevice::OpenDevice(void)
00059 {
00060     CLI_ASSERT(& m_cliOutput != this);
00061     if (! m_cliOutput.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00062     {
00063         m_cliLastError = m_cliOutput.GetLastError();
00064         return false;
00065     }
00066 
00067     if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00068     {
00069         m_pfFile = fopen(m_strFileName, "r");
00070         if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00071         {
00072             m_cliLastError
00073                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, ResourceString::Concat("Cannot open input file '", m_strFileName, "'"))
00074                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, ResourceString::Concat("Impossible d'ouvrir le fichier d'entrée '", m_strFileName, "'"));
00075             return false;
00076         }
00077     }
00078 
00079     return true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 const bool InputFileDevice::CloseDevice(void)
00083 {
00084     bool b_Res = true;
00085 
00086     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00087     {
00088         if (fclose(m_pfFile) != 0)
00089         {
00090             m_cliLastError
00091                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, ResourceString::Concat("Cannot close input file '", m_strFileName, "'"))
00092                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, ResourceString::Concat("Impossible de fermer le fichier d'entrée '", m_strFileName, "'"));
00093             b_Res = false;
00094         }
00095         m_pfFile = NULL;
00096     }
00097 
00098     if (! m_cliOutput.CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00099     {
00100         m_cliLastError = m_cliOutput.GetLastError();
00101         b_Res = false;
00102     }
00103 
00104     return b_Res;
00105 }
00106 
00107 const KEY InputFileDevice::GetKey(void) const
00108 {
00109     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00110     {
00111         m_iCurrentLine = m_iNextLine;
00112         m_iCurrentColumn = m_iNextColumn;
00113         char c_Char = NULL_KEY;
00114         while ( (! feof(m_pfFile))
00115                 && (fread(& c_Char, sizeof(char), 1, m_pfFile) == 1))
00116         {
00117             if (c_Char == '\n')
00118             {
00119                 m_iNextLine ++;
00120                 m_iNextColumn = 1;
00121             }
00122             else
00123             {
00124                 m_iNextColumn ++;
00125             }
00126             KEY e_Key = IODevice::GetKey(c_Char);
00127             if (e_Key != NULL_KEY)
00128             {
00129                 m_cliLastError
00130                     .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, ResourceString::Concat("Error while reading input file '", m_strFileName, "'"))
00131                     .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, ResourceString::Concat("Erreur de lecture du fichier d'entrée '", m_strFileName, "'"));
00132                 return e_Key;
00133             }
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     return NULL_KEY;
00138 }
00139 
00140 void InputFileDevice::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00141 {
00142     m_cliOutput.PutString(STR_Out);
00143 }

00145 void InputFileDevice::Beep(void) const
00146 {
00147     m_cliOutput.Beep();

00172 OutputFileDevice::~OutputFileDevice(void)

00176 const bool OutputFileDevice::OpenDevice(void)
00177 {
00178     if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00179     {
00180         m_pfFile = fopen(m_strFileName, "w");
00181         if (m_pfFile == NULL)
00182         {
00183             m_cliLastError
00184                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, ResourceString::Concat("Cannot open output file '", m_strFileName, "'"))
00185                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, ResourceString::Concat("Impossible d'ouvrir le fichier de sortie '", m_strFileName, "'"));
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188     }
00189 
00190     return true;
00191 }
00192 
00193 const bool OutputFileDevice::CloseDevice(void)
00194 {
00195     bool b_Res = true;
00196 
00197     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00198     {
00199         if (fclose(m_pfFile) != 0)
00200         {
00201             m_cliLastError
00202                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, ResourceString::Concat("Cannot close output file '", m_strFileName, "'"))
00203                 .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, ResourceString::Concat("Impossible de fermer le fichier de sortie '", m_strFileName, "'"));
00204             b_Res = false;
00205         }
00206         m_pfFile = NULL;
00207     }
00208 
00209     return b_Res;
00210 }
00211 
00212 void OutputFileDevice::PutString(const char* const STR_Out) const
00213 {
00214     if (m_pfFile != NULL)
00215     {
00216         fwrite(STR_Out, sizeof(char), strlen(STR_Out), m_pfFile);
00217     }
00218 }
